title: Manage access with Public Cloud users
userParagraphe1: Your data and business security is paramount. This is why you are required to provide additional authentication when using AI Tools.
userParagraphe2: When you work with our tools, you need to authenticate yourself through common users across your entire Public Cloud project.
userParagraphe3: With Public Cloud users, you can access your notebooks, jobs and applications. To be able to experiment freely, you must choose at least an "Admin" or "AI" role.
formUserNameErrorPattern: Must only contain numbers, letters, underscores or dashes, must not start with a dash.
formUserToastSuccessDescription: The user has been successfully created
formUserToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred creating the user
formUserPasswordSuccess: The user has been created with the following password
